thumb.title: Bullseye Media
thumb.text: A media company homepage that reflects effective marketing online through its modern graphics and informative texts. Created in Wordpress.

page.subTitle: Bullseye Media – Company image and online marketing
page.text: Bullseye Media is a business that improves company image online with online marketing from the most effective platforms. I created the webpage to reflect its effective marketing online by modern graphics and informative texts. It is made with plenty of “call to action”-links for easy access to sign up and contact requests. I optimized the page with a responsive design to make it adjust to any devices.
